mapper.select: SELECT B.NO , B.TITLE , B.CONTENT , B.CATEGORY_NO , C.TITLE AS category , B.WRITER_NO , M.NICK , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.SECRET_YN , B.MODIFY_DATE , B.DEL_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.WRITER_NO = M.NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON B.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO ORDER BY B.NO

SELECT B.NO , B.TITLE , B.CONTENT , B.CATEGORY_NO , C.TITLE AS category , B.WRITER_NO , M.NICK , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.SECRET_YN , B.MODIFY_DATE , B.DEL_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.WRITER_NO = M.NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON B.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO WHERE B.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR B.CONTENT LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY B.TITLE
